attributes.action: Permit the BBC to be a worldwide broadcaster on the internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC has introduced an internet service  called iPlayer. This allows UK-only access to recent TV programs. And due to rights restrictions prorgams are available only for 7 days after broadcasting.

I call upon the Prime Minister to

1. Open the BBC charter to permit world wide provision of this service

2. Cut the powers of the rights holders to allow permanent recording of programs  for personal use.
